title: Ranked Team (LF Gold +)
body:
Hi guys 

Looking for a friendly bunch to make a ranked 5s team. The roster can be between 5-10, if numbers get big we can simply play whenever 5 are on - to get dat grind going. 

It is preferable that those interested are ongoing and friendly and not just a 12 yr old raging behind a computer screen.

All positions are currently available so just tell me where and what you would like to play. 

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hi, I don't play much ranked (except ranked 5's, team just finished provisionals 4-1, Bronze 2â€¦.) but my normal MMR is about silver-gold level. I play mid and a mean Katarina and Orianna, msg me in game if your interested in me :D, also I play a bit of adc. Got 2 level 30 accounts: Main - TSM NewTronix, Smurf - Newtronix
Thanks,
Tronix
